VISUAL ELEMENTS.Composition type: Medium close-up; single person in focus, holding an object towards the camera (shallow depth of field).

Human presence.Expressions: Person's face is partially obscured by the supplement bottle; not much visible emotion, but gesture implies seriousness or informative intent.
Human presence.Demographics: Adult male, light/medium skin, wearing glasses, wedding ring visible.

Main objects/props featured: Subtle branding/logo in top right corner
VISUAL ELEMENTS.Background environment: Blurry, neutral, gray background; minimal distractions to focus attention on main subject and object.

Font characteristics.Main text (bottom): Large, bold sans-serif, all lowercase except abbreviations, white for maximum contrast
Font characteristics.Bottle label: Standard sans-serif, medium size, white on dark blue for readability
Font characteristics.Logo and channel info: Modern/clean sans-serif, smaller size, mix of teal/green and white

Text placement within frame.Main question text: Lower third, prominent and centered, overlaying person’s chest
Text placement within frame.Supplement label: On the object held in foreground, readable
Text placement within frame.Channel logo/info: Upper right corner, smaller and less intrusive

TEXT ELEMENTS.Trigger words highlight: 'raises', 'testosterone', 'estrogen' signal potential health benefits or controversy, '??' adds curiosity/uncertainty for clickbait.

THEMATIC ELEMENTS.Visual metaphors or symbols: Supplement bottle as a focal point symbolizes easy accessibility and actionable health change; the direct gesture emphasizes a call-to-action or promise.
Clickbait techniques employed: Leading question with double question marks to provoke curiosity
Reference to popular hormones associated with health and vitality
OTC implies accessibility and immediate benefit

THUMBNAIL-TITLE RELATIONSHIP.Visual reinforcement: The thumbnail directly shows DHEA, the subject of the video title, reinforcing the focus on OTC supplements and hormone benefits. The question in the thumbnail mirrors the video title's promise of hormone boosts and related health advantages.
THUMBNAIL-TITLE RELATIONSHIP.Contrasts or mismatches: The thumbnail emphasizes 'testosterone, estrogen' specifically, while the title also highlights menopause symptoms and bone strength. The thumbnail visual does not depict menopause or bone health directly.
THUMBNAIL-TITLE RELATIONSHIP.Synergy: Both the text and visuals build curiosity about whether an OTC supplement like DHEA can significantly influence hormones, supporting the theme of the video.
